title: Character Sketches
description: In our longest episode yet, we break down two massively consequential cases: Dobbs v. Jackson Women's Health Organization and New York State Rifle & Pistol Association v. Bruen.
author: pod@dividedargument.com (Will Baude & Dan Epps)
